short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IGPost to export & extract Instagram posts, Export to Excel/CSV/JSON in one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically download Instagram posts to Excel/CSV/JSON tool.
Support to export posts from Instagram username, hashtag, and location.

#HOW TO GET STARTED?
After installing this extension, choose the export type, including Instagram username, hashtag and location, enter the correct name or URL, and click this button to start the download.

#v1.4.0 CHANGE LOG
✓ Fixed the fetch user posts empty data issue

#v1.3.3 CHANGE LOG
✓ add export from multiple users

#v1.3.2 CHANGE LOG
✓ add is carousel field
✓ add carousel multiple image URLs

#UPGRADE
✓ Auto all task save history
✓ Resume task progress from history page
✓ Add export Post URL / All fields option

#FEATURES
✓ Unlimited Posts Export
✓ One Click to Export Posts for Instagram
✓ Export data to XLSX(Excel)/CSV/JSON
✓ Automatically download when data is ready
✓ Random Interval range and wait for a period, useful for downloading large amounts of data
✓ Automatically Error Handling for 403, 429, and 400 error message

#EXPORT FIELDS
#Media ID, #Shortcode, Likes, #Comments, #Caption, #Hashtags, #Post URL, #Thumbnail URL, #Image URL, #Is Video, #Video URL, #Video View Count, #User ID, #User Name, #Location ID, #Location Name, #Location URL, #Location Slug, #Location Lat, #Location Long, #Date(GMT), #Timestamp

#SUPPORTED FORMATS
Export post list from Instagram into Excel, CSV, and JSON formats

#FAQ
https://igpostsexporter.extensionsfox.com/#faq
If you have any questions, please keep in touch via help@extensionsfox.com.

#DATA PRIVACY
All data is processed in your local computer, never passing through our web server, and no one knows what you exported.
